title: Bandwidth: Immortals Fenyx Rising free to play for Prime members on Amazon Luna
content:
While most other cloud gaming services like GeForce Now and Xbox Cloud Gaming are quiet this week, Amazon Luna isn’t taking a break after just launching in full. In fact, Luna is bringing Immortals Fenyx Rising to Amazon Prime members for free, for a limited amount of time. To add, NVIDIA GeForce Now is also bringing monthly RTX 3080 memberships to the table.

more…

The post Bandwidth: Immortals Fenyx Rising free to play for Prime members on Amazon Luna appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Amazon's Luna is making a popular title available for free for Prime members. To add, NVIDIA GeForce is adding RTX 3080 monthly memberships.
